ru: Вытяните поднятую ногу назад и вверх.
en: Stretch your lifted leg back and up.
enSynonyms: Extend your raised leg backward and upwards.
Reach your elevated leg behind you and upwards.
Straighten your lifted leg, moving it back and upward.
Stretch the lifted leg behind you, reaching it upward.

en: Lower both elbows down onto the mat.
enSynonyms: Gently place your elbows onto the mat.
Bring both elbows down to rest on the mat.
Settle your elbows onto the mat with control.
Rest your elbows softly on the mat, ensuring a stable position.
Extend the leg that bears your weight.
Unbend the leg you are balancing on.
Fully stretch out your stabilising leg.
Lengthen through the leg holding your body upright.
Open up the knee of your grounded leg to straighten it.

ru: Эка п+ада +адха мукхо шван+асана на локтях.
Собака мордой вниз на одной ноге на локтях.

en: Press your raised heel upwards with intention.
enSynonyms: Push your lifted heel firmly towards the ceiling.
Engage your raised heel by driving it upward.
Apply pressure with your elevated heel, directing it upwards.
Actively press your heel upward, maintaining a strong and steady force.

ru: Выталкивайтесь локтями, чтобы потянуться грудной клеткой к колену опорной ноги.

en: Shift the attention to the face muscles.

Turn your focus to the area around your face.
Guide your attention to the facial region.

Concentrate on the sensations in your facial muscles.
Shift your focus to the tension or relaxation in your face.
Tune into the movement or stillness in your facial muscles.
Focus your mind on the face and its muscles.

ru: Сохраняя упор в локтях, сделайте отшаг назад стопами.
Отрегулируйте высоту таза, чтобы от макушки до пяток образовалась прямая линия.
en: Adjust the height of your pelvis so that a straight line forms from the crown of your head to your heels.
enSynonyms: Adjust the position of your pelvis to align your body from head to heels.
Set the height of your pelvis to ensure a straight line from your head to your heels.
Align your pelvis so that your body forms a straight line from the crown of your head down to your heels.

Position your pelvis so a straight line runs from the top of your head to your heels.

Correct the height of your pelvis to create a continuous line from the crown of your head to your heels.

Alter your pelvis position to form a straight line from head to heels.
Adjust the height of your pelvis to align your body into a straight line from head to heels.
Ensure your pelvis is positioned so that your body forms a continuous line from head to heels.

en: Keep your pelvis lifted and supported in the air.

Hold your pelvis up, ensuring it stays lifted and stable.
Keep the pelvic area raised, maintaining a strong and steady position.

Hold your pelvis aloft, keeping it balanced and supported.

ru: Сделайте отшаг стопами назад, чтобы лоб оказался между локтями.
en: Step the feet back so that the forehead is between the elbows.

ru: Выведите в одну линию ребра, таз и туловище так чтобы от пятки до макушки образовалась прямая линия.
en: Align your ribs, pelvis, and torso in one straight line, so that there is a straight line from your heel to the crown of your head.

ru: Кисти разведите в стороны на уровень плечевых суставов.
en: On the exhale, spread the hands apart to the level of the shoulder joints.
